name: Advanced Crystal Beast Amber Mammoth
desc: If "Advanced Dark" is not in a Field Zone, send this monster to the GY. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect that targets your "Advanced Crystal Beast" card(s) or "Advanced Dark" (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation. Once per turn, when your "Advanced Crystal Beast" monster is targeted for an attack: You can negate that attack. If this face-up card is destroyed in a Monster Zone, you can place it face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell, instead of sending it to the GY.
